  <script type="application/javascript">
   /** DCF lib v1.6 **/
  window.adv_global = window.adv_global || {};
  window.adv_event = window.adv_event || [];
  window.adv_lib = window.adv_lib || {};
  (function(h, c, e) {
      var d = location.hostname.split("."),
          g = d[d.length - 1];
      if (1 < d.length) {
          var k = d[d.length - 2],
              g = k + "." + g;
          if ("com" === k || "co" === k) g = d[d.length - 3] + "." + g
      }
      h.page_top_domain = g;
      e.setCookie = function(b, m, a, e, c, d) {
          d = "";
          if (a) {
              a = +a;
              switch (e) {
                  case "y":
                      a *= 365;
                  case "d":
                      a *= 1440;
                  case "m":
                      a *= 60
              }
              c = new Date;
              c.setSeconds(c.getSeconds() + a);
              d = ";expires=" + c.toUTCString()
          }
          a = "";
          0 < h.page_top_domain.indexOf(".") && (a = ";domain=." + h.page_top_domain);
          document.cookie = b + "=" + encodeURIComponent(m) + d + ";path=/" + a
      };
      e.delCookie =
          function(b) {
              e.setCookie(b, "", -1)
          };
      e.getCookie = function(b, c) {
          return (c = document.cookie.match("(^|;)\\s*" + b + "\\s*=\\s*([^;]+)")) ? decodeURIComponent(c.pop()) : null
      };
      c.store = function(b) {
          if (e.isArray(b)) {
              var c = e.getCookie("adv_ev");
              try {
                  var a = JSON.parse(c) || [];
                  a.push(b);
                  e.setCookie("adv_ev", JSON.stringify(a))
              } catch (d) {}
          }
      };
      e.isArray = function(b) {
          return b ? "[object Array]" === Object.prototype.toString.call(b) : !1
      };
      e.copy = function(b) {
          var c = {};
          try {
              c = JSON.parse(JSON.stringify(b))
          } catch (a) {}
          return c
      };
      try {
          var l = JSON.parse(e.getCookie("adv_ev"));
          if (e.isArray(l)) {
              for (; 0 < l.length;) c.push(l.shift());
              e.delCookie("adv_ev")
          }
      } catch (b) {}
      c.listener = [];
      c.history = [];
      c.on = function(b, d, a) {
          if ("string" == typeof b && "function" == typeof d) {
              if (this.listener.push([b, d]), a)
                  for (a = 0; a < this.history.length; a++)
                      if ("all" == b || b == this.history[a][0]) try {
                          d(this.history[a][0], e.copy(this.history[a][1]))
                      } catch (f) {
                          "dcf error" != this.history[a][0] && c.push(["dcf error", {
                              type: "listener",
                              event: this.history[a][0],
                              id: this.listener.length - 1,
                              error: f.toString()
                          }])
                      }
          } else c.push(["dcf error",
              {
                  type: "on",
                  error: "invalid syntax",
                  help: ".on(STR,FUNC,BOOL)"
              }
          ])
      };
      for (c.push = function(b) {
              if (!e.isArray(b) || "string" != typeof b[0] || "undefined" != typeof b[1] && "object" != typeof b[1]) c.push(["dcf error", {
                  type: "push",
                  error: "invalid syntax",
                  help: ".push([STR,OBJ])"
              }]);
              else {
                  for (var d = b[0], a = b[1] || {}, f = 0, g = this.listener.length; f < g; f++)
                      if (d == this.listener[f][0] || "all" == this.listener[f][0]) try {
                          this.listener[f][1](d, e.copy(a))
                      } catch (h) {
                          "dcf error" != d && c.push(["dcf error", {
                              type: "listener",
                              event: d,
                              id: f,
                              error: h.toString()
                          }])
                      }
                  this.history.push(e.copy(b))
              }
          }; 0 <
          c.length;) c.push(c.shift())
  })(adv_global, adv_event, adv_lib);

  /** Hybrid implementation for testing Q-Gov**/
  var digitalData = digitalData || {};
  digitalData.ready = function() {
      adv_event.push(["pageview", digitalData]);
  }

  /** Tealium v1.0**/
  adv_global.cfg_tealium_account = "consumentenbond"; // <-- CONFIGURATION REQUIRED
  adv_global.cfg_tealium_profile = "adv-cb-nl"; // <-- CONFIGURATION REQUIRED
  adv_global.cfg_tealium_load_sync = 1; // <-- REMOVE LINE IF NOT NEEDED
  (function(b, f, c) {
      var a = document.location.href.split("tealium=");
      1 < a.length && (a = a[1].split("&")[0].split("#")[0]) && c.setCookie("tealium_env", escape(a));
      a = b.cfg_tealium_environment = c.getCookie("tealium_env") || b.cfg_tealium_environment || "prod";
      b.cfg_tealium_base_url = "//tags.tiqcdn.com/utag/" + b.cfg_tealium_account + "/" + b.cfg_tealium_profile + "/" + a + "/";
      if (b.cfg_tealium_load_sync) {
          var d = "";

          document.write("<script type='text/javascript' src='" + b.cfg_tealium_base_url +
              "utag.sync.js" + d + "'>\x3c/script>")
      }
      c.loadUtag = function() {
          if (!c.loadUtag.run_once) {
              c.loadUtag.run_once = 1;
              var a = "";
              "dev" == b.cfg_tealium_environment && (a = "?nocache=" + Math.random());
              var e = document.createElement("script"),
                  d = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
              e.type = "text/javascript";
              e.async = !0;
              e.src = b.cfg_tealium_base_url + "utag.js" + a;
              d.parentNode.insertBefore(e, d)
          }
      };
      f.on("pageview", c.loadUtag, 1)
  })(adv_global, adv_event, adv_lib);

  /** O2MC DimML Platform v1.0 **/
  (function(a, b) {
      a = document.createElement("script");
      b = document.getElementsByTagName("script")[0];
      a.type = "text/javascript";
      a.async = !0;
      a.src = "//session.consumentenbond.nl/dimml.js";
      b.parentNode.insertBefore(a, b)
  })();

  /** O2MC DimML Qgov API v1.0 **/
  adv_lib.qgov = {
      set: function(a) {
          try {
              dimml.consent.set(a), adv_event.push(["qgov update", {
                  level: a
              }])
          } catch (b) {}
      },
      get: function() {
          try {
              return dimml.consent.get()
          } catch (a) {
              return -2
          }
      }
  };

  <script>
   var dsmConsentUpdateListener = function () {
        window.location.reload();
      };

  <!-- The function below is used in pricewise iframes -->
  <script>
   function getAdobeMC () {

        var mcorgid = "3C2215F354E783880A4C98A4%40AdobeOrg"; // Adobe Organization ID
        var adobe_mc = "";
        var mcmid = "";

        // Get the value of 's_ecid' cookie. Equivalent getCookie function can be used.
        if (adv_lib.getCookie("s_ecid") !== null) {
          mcmid = adv_lib.getCookie("s_ecid").split("|")[1];
        } else if (adv_lib.getCookie("AMCV_" + mcorgid) !== null) {
          mcmid = adv_lib.getCookie("AMCV_" + mcorgid).split("|")[2];
        }
        if (mcmid !== "") {
          adobe_mc = "adobe_mc=" + (encodeURIComponent(["MCMID=" + mcmid, "MCORGID=" + mcorgid, "TS=" + Math.round((new Date).getTime() / 1e3)].join("|"))); // Build the adobe_mc value
        }

        return adobe_mc;
      }
  </script>
  <style>
   .sitemenu-editor {
        position: relative;
        min-height: 100px;
        border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);
      }

      .sitemenu-editor a.hst-fab {
        top: 15px;
        right: 70px;
      }
  </style>
 </head>
 <body data-hj-ignore-attributes="">
  <div data-test="browserLegacyCheckController" style="display:none; background-color: #333333; color: #fff; width:100%;">
   <div style="max-width:1200px; margin: 0 auto; box-sizing: border-box; width:100%; padding: 30px; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif;">
    <div>
     <h3>
      <span style="display:inline-block; font-weight: bold; font-size:18px; text-align: center; border-radius: 50%; width:20px; height:16px; overflow:hidden; line-height: 12px; padding-top: 4px; background-color: #fff; color: #333; position: relative; top : 1px;">
       !
      </span>
      <span>
       Je browser is verouderd.
      </span>
     </h3>
     <p style="margin-bottom:12px">

     </p>

       Klik hier om te lezen welke browsers geschikt zijn
      </a>
     </p>
    </div>
   </div>

   !function(n,e,o){function i(n,e){return typeof n===e}function s(){var n,e,o,s,r,f,u;for(var c in t)if(t.hasOwnProperty(c)){if(n=[],e=t[c],e.name&&(n.push(e.name.toLowerCase()),e.options&&e.options.aliases&&e.options.aliases.length))for(o=0;o<e.options.aliases.length;o++)n.push(e.options.aliases[o].toLowerCase());for(s=i(e.fn,"function")?e.fn():e.fn,r=0;r<n.length;r++)f=n[r],u=f.split("."),1===u.length?Modernizr[u[0]]=s:(!Modernizr[u[0]]||Modernizr[u[0]]instanceof Boolean||(Modernizr[u[0]]=new Boolean(Modernizr[u[0]])),Modernizr[u[0]][u[1]]=s),a.push((s?"":"no-")+u.join("-"))}}var t=[],r={_version:"3.6.0",_config:{classPrefix:"",enableClasses:!0,enableJSClass:!0,usePrefixes:!0},_q:[],on:function(n,e){var o=this;setTimeout(function(){e(o[n])},0)},addTest:function(n,e,o){t.push({name:n,fn:e,options:o})},addAsyncTest:function(n){t.push({name:null,fn:n})}},Modernizr=function(){};Modernizr.prototype=r,Modernizr=new Modernizr,Modernizr.addTest("promises",function(){return"Promise"in n&&"resolve"in n.Promise&&"reject"in n.Promise&&"all"in n.Promise&&"race"in n.Promise&&function(){var e;return new n.Promise(function(n){e=n}),"function"==typeof e}()}),Modernizr.addTest("fetch","fetch"in n);var a=[];s(),delete r.addTest,delete r.addAsyncTest;for(var f=0;f<Modernizr._q.length;f++)Modernizr._q[f]();n.Modernizr=Modernizr}(window,document);

    var element = document.querySelector('[data-test="browserLegacyCheckController"]');
    if(element){
      element.style.display = "block"
    }
  }

             <a class="text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="" href="/mobiel-abonnement/vergelijker?icmp=home_mediapool_groot_mobiele_abonnementen_vergelijken" target="_self" title="Ook een grotere databundel?">
              Ook een grotere databundel?
             </a>
            </h3>
            <!-- -->
            <div class="space-y-3 content-block text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="">
             <p>
              Vergelijk sim only en mobiele abonnementen. En kies de databundel die het beste bij je past.
             </p>
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li>
         <div class="w-full space-y-4 relative">
          <a class="block relative" href="https://community.consumentenbond.nl/denk-mee-16/gebakken-lucht-deel-je-voorbeelden-22563?icmp=home_mediapool_groot_praat_mee_gebakken_lucht" target="_blank">

           <!-- -->
          </a>
          <!-- -->
          <!-- -->
          <div class="w-full pr-5 pb-5">
           <!-- -->
           <div class="w-full space-y-3" data-v-5245271c="">

              Praat mee: gebakken lucht

  list-style: none;

   <div class="tw" data-faas-ssr="" data-server-rendered="true" id="__FAAS_SSR__1616396189180__C8B__">
    <div class="pt-16 pb-16">
     <div class="max-w-6xl mx-auto my-0 w-full space-y-12" data-test="mediapool">
      <div class="w-11/12 lg:w-full px-4 space-y-3 mx-auto">
       <h2>
        Laatste nieuws
       </h2>
       <!-- -->
      </div>
      <div class="w-full md:w-11/12 lg:w-full md:px-4 mx-auto p-0">
       <ul class="grid md:grid-cols-2 gap-5 lg:grid-cols-4">
        <li class="flex p-0">
         <div class="w-full md:rounded md:shadow bg-white pb-6 md:pb-0">
          <a class="w-full block relative" href="/nieuws/2021/reissom-niet-altijd-gedekt-door-garantiefonds" target="_self">
           <img alt="Financiële risico's bij boeken compleet nieuwe reis" class="w-full md:rounded-t" height="266" loading="lazy" src="/binaries/content/gallery/cbhippowebsite/nieuws/afbeeldingen/financiele-risicos-bij-boeken-compleet-nieuwe-reis.jpg/financiele-risicos-bij-boeken-compleet-nieuwe-reis.jpg/cbhippowebsite%3Ail" width="400"/>
           <!-- -->
          </a>
          <!-- -->
          <!-- -->
          <div class="small-12 fo cb-default padding-20">
           <div class="w-11/12 lg:w-full text-xs text-blue-dark">
            <span>
             Nieuws
            </span>
            <span>
             |
            </span>
            <span>
             19 mrt.
            </span>
           </div>
           <div class="w-full space-y-3" data-v-5245271c="">
            <h3 class="text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="">
             <a class="text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="" href="/nieuws/2021/reissom-niet-altijd-gedekt-door-garantiefonds" target="_self" title="Reissom niet altijd gedekt door garantiefonds">
              Reissom niet altijd gedekt door garantiefonds
             </a>
            </h3>
            <!-- -->
            <div class="space-y-3 content-block text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="">
             Consumenten die een reis boeken, kunnen hun reissom in sommige gevallen kwijtraken bij een faillissement. De Consumentenbond waarschuwt dat de reissom niet altijd gedekt is door een garantiefonds. Vouchers met SGR-dekking zijn wel goed beschermd
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="flex p-0">
         <div class="w-full md:rounded md:shadow bg-white pb-6 md:pb-0">
          <a class="w-full block relative" href="/nieuws/2021/neem-nationaal-isolatieprogramma-op-in-regeerakkoord" target="_self">
           <img alt="Afbeelding van twee mannen die een isolatieplaat op maat snijden.            <!-- -->
          </a>
          <!-- -->
          <!-- -->
          <div class="small-12 fo cb-default padding-20">
           <div class="w-11/12 lg:w-full text-xs text-blue-dark">
            <span>
             Nieuws
            </span>
            <span>
             |
            </span>
            <span>
             16 mrt.
            </span>
           </div>
           <div class="w-full space-y-3" data-v-5245271c="">
            <h3 class="text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="">
             <a class="text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="" href="/nieuws/2021/neem-nationaal-isolatieprogramma-op-in-regeerakkoord" target="_self" title="‘Neem Nationaal Isolatieprogramma op in regeerakkoord’">
              ‘Neem Nationaal Isolatieprogramma op in regeerakkoord’
             </a>
            </h3>
            <!-- -->
            <div class="space-y-3 content-block text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="">
             De komende regering moet een Nationaal Isolatieprogramma opnemen in haar regeerakkoord. Daarvoor pleit een brede coalitie van organisaties, waaronder de Consumentenbond.
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="flex p-0">
         <div class="w-full md:rounded md:shadow bg-white pb-6 md:pb-0">

           <img alt="Uitkomst vakantiemeldpunt nieuws" class="w-full md:rounded-t" height="266" loading="lazy" src="/binaries/content/gallery/cbhippowebsite/nieuws/afbeeldingen/uitkomst-vakantiemeldpunt-nieuws.jpg/uitkomst-vakantiemeldpunt-nieuws.jpg/cbhippowebsite%3Ail" width="400"/>
           <!-- -->
          </a>
          <!-- -->
          <!-- -->

             Nieuws
            </span>
            <span>
             |
            </span>
            <span>
             16 mrt.
            </span>
           </div>
           <div class="w-full space-y-3" data-v-5245271c="">
            <h3 class="text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="">
             <a class="text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="" href="/nieuws/2021/consumentenbond-houdt-uitbetaling-coronavouchers-in-de-gaten" target="_self" title="Consumentenbond houdt uitbetaling coronavouchers in de gaten">
              Consumentenbond houdt uitbetaling coronavouchers in de gaten
             </a>
            </h3>
            <!-- -->
            <div class="space-y-3 content-block text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="">
             De Consumentenbond opent een e-mailadres voor consumenten met een verlopen SGR-coronavoucher. Consumenten die niet volgens afspraak na een jaar hun geld terugkrijgen, kunnen zich hier melden.
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </li>
        <li class="flex p-0">
         <div class="w-full md:rounded md:shadow bg-white pb-6 md:pb-0">
          <a class="w-full block relative" href="/nieuws/2021/rechtszaak-tegen-facebook-van-start" target="_self">
           <img alt="Mediapool FB 1200x800" class="w-full md:rounded-t" height="266" loading="lazy" src="/binaries/content/gallery/cbhippowebsite/landingspaginas/acties/facebook/afbeeldingen/mediapool-fb-1200x800.jpg/mediapool-fb-1200x800.jpg/cbhippowebsite%3Ail" width="400"/>
           <!-- -->
          </a>
          <!-- -->
          <!-- -->

             |

              Rechtszaak tegen Facebook van start
             </a>
            </h3>
            <!-- -->
            <div class="space-y-3 content-block text-blue-dark" data-v-5245271c="">
             Op 1 april vindt de eerste zitting plaats in de rechtszaak die de Data Privacy Stichting samen met de Consumentenbond aanspande tegen Facebook. Tijdens deze zitting wordt de zaak nog niet inhoudelijk behandeld.
            </div>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </li>
       </ul>
      </div>
      <div class="w-11/12 lg:w-full px-4 mx-auto">

          </a>
         </li>
        </ul>

   <style data-vue-ssr-id="3f7e2950:0">
    div.inner-elements-white[data-v-5245271c] * {
  color: white;
}
div.inner-elements-white[data-v-5245271c] ul.checkmarks li::before {
  color: white;
}
div.inner-elements-white[data-v-5245271c] li::marker {
  color: white;
}
.content-block[data-v-5245271c] .checkmarks {
  list-style: none;
  margin-left: 30px;
}
   </style>
   <div class="tw" data-faas-ssr="" data-server-rendered="true" id="__FAAS_SSR__1616396189211__SQ8__">
    <div class="pt-16 pb-16">
     <div class="max-w-6xl mx-auto my-0 w-full space-y-12" data-test="mediapool">
      <div class="w-11/12 lg:w-full px-4 space-y-3 mx-auto">
       <h2>
        Vers getest
       </h2>
       <div class="text-lg">
        De nieuwste updates van tests voor jou op een rij.
       </div>
      </div>

       <li class="mr-5" data-v-fa417340="">
        <a class="text-white" data-v-fa417340="" href="https://www.linkedin.com/company/consumentenbond" target="_blank" title="LinkedIn">
         <i class="fa fa-linkedin" data-v-fa417340="">
         </i>
        </a>
       </li>
      </ul>
     </div>
     <div class="md:w-full sm:w-full text-center px-4 pb-8 flex justify-center" data-v-fa417340="">
      <p class="w-full text-xs text-white" data-v-fa417340="">
       <span data-v-fa417340="">
        6.856
       </span>

        consumenten

        </a>
        met gemiddeld een
